Glimmora (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0969: Glimmet
Pokémon
#0971: Greavard →

Glimmora has been featured on 4 different cards since it debuted in the Paldea Evolved expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Glimmora cards are normally Fighting-type Stage 1 Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Glimmora

Glimmora
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
Card Type Mark English
Expansion 		Rarity # Japanese
Expansion 		Rarity #
Glimmora Paldea Evolved 126/193 Snow Hazard 044/071
Glimmora Twilight Masquerade 109/167 Transformation Mask 063/101
Glimmora Surging Sparks 115/191 Super Electric Breaker 068/106
Glimmora
Card Type Mark English
Expansion 		Rarity # Japanese
Expansion 		Rarity #
Glimmora Obsidian Flames 123/197 Ruler of the Black Flame 065/108
Obsidian Flames 213/197 Ruler of the Black Flame 124/108
        Shiny Treasure ex 111/190
Paldean Fates 218/091 Shiny Treasure ex 329/190


This article is part of Project TCG, a Bulbapedia project that aims to report on every aspect of the Pokémon Trading Card Game.
